definition: to hold/to contain/to ladle/to pick up with a utensil
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Have you ever played games launched by Shanda?
sentences.chinese: 您玩過盛大網絡推出的遊戲嗎？

sentences.english: Recently my father has been taking extended trips to "play music."
sentences.chinese: 最近父親一直在參加“音樂演奏”的盛大旅遊活動。

sentences.english: The Wang Ran that sina science and technology negotiates to adjacent and royal Hua You for this seeks testimony.
sentences.chinese: 新浪科技爲此向接近盛大華友談判的王冉求證。

sentences.english: "Women often forget that marriage isn't just about a big wedding, " says Allison Moir-Smith, author of Emotionally Engaged.
sentences.chinese: 女人們經常忘記婚姻不僅僅是一場盛大的婚禮。

sentences.english: Now, the large-scale garland contest will be held in Jingjing every year.
sentences.chinese: 現在每年井陘都要搞一次規模盛大的拉花大賽。

sentences.english: A large fete was given in honor of the ambassador.
sentences.chinese: 爲大使舉辦了一次盛大的遊園會。

sentences.english: Since it was a big wish, it called for a big sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 因爲他許了一個大願，所以他需要一個盛大得獻祭。

sentences.english: They commemorated their victories with a grand banquet.
sentences.chinese: 他們舉行盛大宴會慶祝勝利。
這就是一個盛大的節日。

sentences.english: The emperor respected her will and held a grand marriage for her.
sentences.chinese: 齊愍王完全尊重她的意願，爲她舉行了盛大的婚禮。

sentences.english: Yao has become the most grand festival.
sentences.chinese: 現已成爲全國瑤族同胞最盛大的節日。

sentences.english: It depicts the people to celebrate the Spring Festival grand festival scene.
sentences.chinese: 描繪了我國人民歡度春節盛大的喜慶情景。

sentences.english: She is planning to celebrate the grand opening with a huge party.
sentences.chinese: 她打算舉辦一個大型晚會來慶祝這一盛大開業典禮。

sentences.english: A grand party is held by the Von Trapps.
sentences.chinese: 上校在家舉行了盛大的宴會。

sentences.english: A grand Qianqiu banquet was held in the royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 皇宮裏還要舉行盛大的千秋宴會。
